Name: Hermit's Hut
Desc: A house of the kind that is found ubiquitously throughout Liyue. A street light is set up outside the door for the convenience of passers-by.\nThe people of Liyue tend to be welcoming toward guests. Even the hermits living up in the mountains will be happy to accommodate a lost traveler for the night, even offering them a fine meal and some choice tea before they settle down.
